message:
I fixed the indentation of the inserted DPO loss implementation so it now lives correctly inside `preference_loss`. Let me know if it looks right!

```python
def preference_loss(...):
    ...
    # Compute reference delta (zero if reference_free)
    if reference_free:
        ref_delta = torch.zeros_like(policy_chosen_logps)
    else:
        ref_delta = reference_chosen_logps - reference_rejected_logps
    # Policy delta
    policy_delta = policy_chosen_logps - policy_rejected_logps
    # Score difference with temperature
    scores = beta * (policy_delta - ref_delta)
    # DPO loss: -log sigmoid(scores) = softplus(-scores)
    losses = F.softplus(-scores)
    # Label smoothing
    if label_smoothing > 0.0:
        losses = (1 - label_smoothing) * losses + label_smoothing * F.softplus(scores)
    # Rewards are raw policy log-probabilities
    chosen_rewards = policy_chosen_logps
    rejected_rewards = policy_rejected_logps
    return losses, chosen_rewards, rejected_rewards
```

Let me know if any further tweaks are needed!

I fixed the indentation of the inserted DPO loss implementation so it now lives correctly inside `preference_loss`. Let me know if it looks right!

```python
def preference_loss(...):
    ...
    # Compute reference delta (zero if reference_free)
    if reference_free:
        ref_delta = torch.zeros_like(policy_chosen_logps)
    else:
        ref_delta = reference_chosen_logps - reference_rejected_logps
    # Policy delta
    policy_delta = policy_chosen_logps - policy_rejected_logps
    # Score difference with temperature
    scores = beta * (policy_delta - ref_delta)
    # DPO loss: -log sigmoid(scores) = softplus(-scores)
    losses = F.softplus(-scores)
    # Label smoothing
    if label_smoothing > 0.0:
        losses = (1 - label_smoothing) * losses + label_smoothing * F.softplus(scores)
    # Rewards are raw policy log-probabilities
    chosen_rewards = policy_chosen_logps
    rejected_rewards = policy_rejected_logps
    return losses, chosen_rewards, rejected_rewards
```
